Name: Pyramid Defense
About the game: Pyramid Defense is a 3D tower defense game. Grave robberies' army will rush to the pyramid from all directions to seize the Pharaoh's coffin. You will play the guard of the pyramid, sniping at the bandits with various weapons. Features Enemies There will be a variety of enemies in the game, each of which has its own characteristics and needs to be dealt with by different strategies. arms Bombs, logs and fireballs all have different effects, or different weapons are used together, which will produce wonderful reactions. Levels At present, there are four levels each with a unique pyramid.
Meta Title: Pyramid Defense: Jan 23, 2020, Bharal and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Pyramid Defense? Check out the release date (Jan 23, 2020), developer insights from Bharal, and a complete game summary.
